body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to us. My name is Olivia Smith and I'm a representative from AutoPro Car Dealership. May I have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Olivia, my name is Jack Thompson.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Jack. Can you provide me with your phone number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is four two five - two three four - one zero seven zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Could you also share your email address with me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email is jack.thompson@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Jack. We will look into the issue with the pricing on your recent purchase. Your feedback is crucial for us to improve our services.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that, Olivia. I was surprised by the discrepancy. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Jack. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us. Thank you for your time.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Olivia. Have a great day!
